item.description:
Wanted to give BD&D'ers a chance to check out Toys N Things and meet some of the local gamers playing at the store. See our gaming area and talk about in store games happening at the store. Including the upcoming Weekend in the Realms event happening at Toys N Things November 6th through the 8th. Players looking for new games or DMs looking for players are welcome to post their requests on the store bulletin board or the Toys N Things facebook page.

So come out for an afternoon of gaming goodness and munchies at Toys N Things

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Toys N Things Monthly Meetup
